amendment.description: To make a technical correction to a project for Rickenbacker Airport, Columbus, Ohio.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3677 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3677 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S4009; text: CR S4009) To make a technical correction to a project for Rickenbacker Airport, Columbus, Ohio.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3677 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3677 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Voinovich.
